questions: I do my homework from  _  to  _  every evening.
article:
I am a school boy. My name is Li Ming. I am fourteen . I'm in Class Two, Grade One. I have a brother. My brother's name is Li Tao. He's seventeen . He's in Class One, Grade Three.
My brother and I are at school. We like our school. My parents are teachers. They work hard. My brother and I study at No. 8 Middle School . There are sixteen girls and twenty--two boys in my class.
We go to school from Monday to Friday. We have no classes on weekends. I usually get up at six
o'clock . I have breakfast at 6:00. I come to school at seven o'clock. Classes start at eight. We have lessons in the morning and two in the afternoon . I have lunch at 11:40 . At three thirty ,we have sports.
We study Chinese, English, math , history, biology, music and art. We like Chinese and English because they are very interesting.
I go home at five o'clock . I eat dinner at six. I do my homework at seven every evening. I do it for two hours . I go to bed at nine thirty.
